extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a particle emitter

    aschmid

    • Constructor Detail

      • Emitter

        public Emitter(java.lang.String file,
       float posX,
       float posY,
       boolean loop)
        Creates a new emitter
        Parameters:
        file - The file and image name to use, in "assets/particles/file."
        posX - the x position to create it
        posY - the y position to create it
        loop - should we play the particle system once, or loop it

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(int delta)
        Updates the given particle system
        Parameters:
        delta - Time since last update

        Checks if this particle system is valid
        Returns:
        if this particle system is valid

      • render

        public void render(Camera cam)
        Renders this particle system
        Parameters:
        cam - The camera to base the position off of

      • render

        public void render(Camera cam,
          float x,
          float y)
        Renders this particle system at a given position
        Parameters:
        cam - The camera to base the position off of
        x - The x coord to render at
        y - The y coord to render at
